DOC.brief_summary: Superovulation conduct 100 mg oral clomiphene citrate ( Clomifene ; Young Poong Pharmaceutical , Incheon , Korea ) 5 day start day 3 menstrual cycle , follow daily injection 150 IU human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG ; Menogon ; FerringPharamceutical Co , Germany ) . When 2 dominant follicle reach diameter 17 mm urinary specimen show positive result luteinizing hormone ( LH ) surge , 5000 IU hCG ( Pregnyl ; Organon , Oss , Netherlands ) inject intramuscularly .
DOC.detailed_description: Superovulation conduct 100 mg oral clomiphene citrate ( Clomifene ; Young Poong Pharmaceutical , Incheon , Korea ) 5 day start day 3 menstrual cycle , follow daily injection 150 IU human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG ; Menogon ; FerringPharamceutical Co , Germany ) . When 2 dominant follicle reach diameter 17 mm urinary specimen show positive result luteinizing hormone ( LH ) surge , 5000 IU hCG ( Pregnyl ; Organon , Oss , Netherlands ) inject intramuscularly . Successful pregnancy IUI confirm ultrasound one visible gestational sac uterine cavity .
DOC.criteria: These patient least 1 tube patent significant intrauterine pelvic abnormality demonstrate pelvicabdominal ultrasonography , hysteroscopy , and/or laparoscopy serum follicular stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level of12 mIU/mL less A woman 's age 40 year , ovarian cyst detect ultrasound examination uterine lesion submucosal leiomyoma , previous diagnosis moderate severe pelvic endometriosis . woman body mass index > 35 kg/m2 , PCOS/anovulatory patient sign hyperandrogenemia
